## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/fs/directory-iterator">directory&#95;iterator</a> - Iterates through the entries in path.

There is no operator++ because we need an error&#95;code. If it&#39;s really needed we can make it call report&#95;fatal&#95;error on error.

Definition at line 1416 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/filesystem-h">FileSystem.h</a>.
